"Hey, <%me>. You came at a good time.": "Can you help me with this idiot's treatment?"
"It looks like he's had a lot of fights with Darkers. Honestly, you needed to take care of this sooner."
"〔...Don't〕〔Touch me!〕〔Don't want〕〔Charity from ARKS〕"
"Charity? This is just the duty we fulfil as ARKS members."
"In other words, we're here to destroy Darkers, like the ones inside of you. That's it"
"〔Inside of me〕〔Darkers?〕"
"Like I'm saying anything you don't already know. You should know the urges you feel inside."
"Or if you'd prefer, I can respect your wishes and let you get infected, and then kill you after the fact."
"〔... ... ...〕〔Life of fighting〕〔Do not make a mockery〕〔Of my honor〕"
"Same goes for you. Do really intend to make of mockery of yourself this way?"
"Don't use the term \"honor\" as an excuse to be stupid."
"Are you really willing to erase your entire culture for the sake of some useless \"honor\"?"
"Looks like you've opened your eyes. I know you're intelligent. You know what I'm saying is right."
"If Dragonkin keep getting infected like this, I don't need to tell you what the result will be."
"〔Are you saying〕〔You can〕〔Destroy〕〔Darkers〕〔Completely?〕"
"By myself, it's impossible. But for the ARKS as a whole, it maybe possible."
"<%me> is here now, so leave this to us."
"〔<%me>〕〔That name〕〔Have heard from En of Hi clan〕〔So that is〕〔You〕"
"〔The legend〕〔Savior〕〔That Ro clan speaks of〕〔Must be you〕"
"That's a pretty tall order, but it might not be too far-fetched."
"For starters, it would be best to help the Dragonkin right in front of us."
"Don't you agree, <%me>?"
